Smart Lightbulb: A lightbulb that can change color and brightness based on your mood or the time of day. It can also be controlled remotely through a smartphone app.
Voice-Activated Lightbulb: A lightbulb that can be turned on and off using voice commands. It can also be programmed to turn on at specific times or in response to certain voice commands.

Energy-Efficient Lightbulb: A lightbulb that uses less energy than traditional incandescent bulbs, but still provides the same amount of light. It can help you save money on your electricity bill and reduce your carbon footprint.
Lightbulb with Motion Sensor: A lightbulb that turns on automatically when motion is detected. It can be useful in areas like hallways or entryways where you don't always need light.

Lightbulb with built-in WiFi: A lightbulb that can be connected to your home's WiFi network and controlled remotely through a smartphone app. It can also be programmed to turn on and off at specific times or in response to certain voice commands.
